concept.definition: The report is complete and ready for use
The report is currently being generated
An error occurred attempting to generate the report

description: The status of the measure report
name: MeasureReportStatus

text.div:
MeasureReportStatus

The status of the measure report

This code system http://hl7.org/fhir/measure-report-status defines the following codes:

CodeDisplayDefinition
complete CompleteThe report is complete and ready for use
pending PendingThe report is currently being generated
error ErrorAn error occurred attempting to generate the report
